table_description: Contains details of individual contacts including personal data, addresses, and related company information.

table_columns.name: address_city
table_columns.description: City of the contact's address.

table_columns.name: address_contacts_addresses_id
table_columns.description: Reference ID for the contact's address record.

table_columns.name: address_country
table_columns.description: Country of the contact's address.

table_columns.name: address_county
table_columns.description: County of the contact's address.

table_columns.name: address_full_address
table_columns.description: Full address information of the contact.

table_columns.name: address_municipality
table_columns.description: Municipality of the contact's address.

table_columns.name: address_street
table_columns.description: Street information for the contact's address.

table_columns.name: address_zipcode
table_columns.description: Zip or postal code for the contact's address.

table_columns.name: contact_id
table_columns.description: treat this column as primary key like 'id' for table. Unique identifier for the contact.

table_columns.name: contact_type
table_columns.description: Type/category of the contact.

table_columns.name: created_date
table_columns.description: Timestamp when the contact record was created.

table_columns.name: email
table_columns.description: Email address of the contact.

table_columns.name: email_for_invoice
table_columns.description: Email address used for invoicing purposes.

table_columns.name: is_client
table_columns.description: Indicator if the contact is associated with a client.

table_columns.name: lastname
table_columns.description: Last name of the contact.

table_columns.name: manager_email
table_columns.description: Email address of the contact's manager.

table_columns.name: manager_id
table_columns.description: Identifier for the contact's manager.

table_columns.name: mobile
table_columns.description: Mobile phone number of the contact.

table_columns.name: modified_date
table_columns.description: Timestamp when the contact record was last modified.

table_columns.name: name
table_columns.description: First name of the contact.

table_columns.name: phone
table_columns.description: Primary phone number of the contact.

table_columns.name: position
table_columns.description: Job position or role of the contact.

table_columns.name: related_company_id
table_columns.description: Identifier of the company related to the contact.

table_columns.name: related_company_name
table_columns.description: Name of the company associated with the contact.

table_columns.name: search_name
table_columns.description: Alternate or searchable name/alias for the contact.

table_columns.name: timezone
table_columns.description: Timezone information relevant to the contact.

table_columns.name: vat_no
table_columns.description: VAT number associated with the contact, if applicable.

table_columns.name: website
table_columns.description: Website URL related to the contact or their company.
